bike.description: 100% Cr-Mo Tubing, Classic Double Downtube, Looptail Rear End, Retro Dropouts, Limited Edition & Individually Numbered

components.description: SE 3-pc Cr-Mo, 180mm, 48 Spline Sealed American BB, 39T Alloy SE Bubble Sprocket
X-Pedo Low Profile Platform w/ Removable Pins
Sealed Bearing 36H High Flange Alloy Bubble Mohawk Hubs w/ Alex DM-24 Double Wall Rims, 17T Freewheel
Cr-Mo Power Wing Cruiser Bar, 28 x 7"
Retro Alloy Top Load w/ Engraved SE Logo & Lightweight Cut-Outs
SE Lightning Blitz Seat w/ Bottle Opener
Retro Pads, Alloy Valve Caps, Touch Up Paint
